faq.question: Will this affect my editing workflow?
faq.answer: No, our upscaler integrates seamlessly with existing workflows like Lightroom and Photoshop.

faq.question: Can it handle different camera brands?
faq.answer: Yes, we support RAW files from all major camera manufacturers including Canon, Nikon, Sony, and Fujifilm.

faq.question: Is it suitable for professional print work?
faq.answer: Absolutely, our output meets professional print standards for galleries and exhibitions.

faq.question: How does enhancement compared to using higher-end cameras?
faq.answer: While AI enhancement significantly improves quality, it complements rather than replaces high-end camera capabilities. highest results come from good source files enhanced with AI technology.

faq.question: Can I maintain my photography style during enhancement?
faq.answer: Yes, our enhancement preserves your artistic style while improving technical quality. You can fine-tune results to match your vision.

faq.question: Is batch processing efficient for large weddings or events?
faq.answer: Absolutely, our batch processing capabilities are designed for handling large volumes while maintaining consistent quality across all images.

faq.question: Can it work with transparent backgrounds?
faq.answer: Yes, our tool preserves transparency and works well with PNG files and layered designs.

faq.question: Is it suitable for logo design?
faq.answer: For vector logos, we recommend SVG format. For raster logos, our enhancement can significantly improve quality.

faq.question: How does it handle text in images?
faq.answer: Our AI algorithms are trAIned to preserve text clarity and readability during enhancement.

faq.question: Can it maintain brand colors during enhancement?
faq.answer: Yes, our technology preserves exact brand colors and maintains brand consistency across all enhanced assets.

faq.question: Is it suitable for both web and print design?
faq.answer: Absolutely, we optimize enhancements for specific output requirements, whether digital or print.

faq.question: How can I ensure consistency across large design projects?
faq.answer: Our batch processing with custom presets ensures consistent enhancement quality across entire design campAIgns.

faq.question: How does this compared to traditional web optimization?
faq.answer: Our AI enhances image quality first, then optimizes for web, achieving better results than compression alone.

faq.question: Can it integrate with existing build processes?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer API integration and CLI tools for seamless integration with your development workflow.

faq.question: What about responsive image generation?
faq.answer: We automatically generate complete responsive image sets with appropriate sizes and breakpoints.

faq.question: Is it suitable for dynamic content?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Our API can handle dynamic image enhancement for user-generated and real-time content.
